m_szDocSumamry: The Standard More good than harm in shift to ‘green’ energy — Romualdez posted February 04, 2016 at 12:01 am by  The Standard Leyte congressman and 2016 senatorial bet Martin Romualdez  stressed on Wednesday that the initial costs of an “energy transition” may be high, but strategic investment in key alternative energy sources would benefit the country in the long run. “Let’s start with small, incremental steps. Transferring to cleaner energy sources is a gradual process, and it needs solid policy and financial backing from a supportive government. It’s high time we look beyond fossil fuels,”
